title: Link Definition and Types
description: Defines the allowable link types and the structure for relationship objects.

targetEntityType.description: The type of entity being linked to (e.g., Person, Organisation, Passport).

targetEntityId.description: The emsId of the target entity.

isDirectional.description: Indicates if the link is one-way (e.g., 'Person HOLDS Passport').

LinkTypeEnum.title: Link Type Enumeration
LinkTypeEnum.description: Authoritative list of allowable relationship/link types between entities.
